revised_title: Lethal Concentration of Acids and Bases in Paramaecium Aurelia
tldr: The authors investigated the lethal concentration of acids and bases on Paramaecium Aurelia, a type of single-celled organism. They found that weak acids and bases were more lethal in lower ionic concentrations, and that the lethal effect of different substances was related to their periodic group in the periodic table. This research helps to understand the toxic effects of various substances on living organisms.
